remarks: Value of join in the set of closed subspaces of Hilbert space ` CH ` . (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2000.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sshjval2 $p |- ( ( A C_ ~H /\ B C_ ~H ) -> ( A vH B ) = |^| { x e. CH | ( A u. B ) C_ x } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
